entries.entry: John Talked to the class most of the day
Jumped in to creating pages with css and flexbox. Feeling overwhelmed
Working on adding scripts to sites. Back in my comfort zone
Found a typo in my saveEntry function, where the header was misspelled, so my POST requests were failing.

Trying to get journal entries to save. I can console log the data going to the saveEntry function, so I know that it is good, but for some reason it shows up as a blank field in the database, with only an ID. Explained the problem to Red, but we didn't see anything obvious. Gonna have to take a break and try again later. If I still have this problem on Monday, I'll ask an instructor for help.
Learning about component coupling. I like the idea of keeping components isolated with well defined interfaces so that they can be removed or replaced without side effects. Very cool!
First draft of the character counter is working. I'm stoked! So cool to see it work. Needs to be moved to its own module. That is a task for tomorrow.
Apparently the new character counter interferes with the submit entry event flow. I'll need to check on that when I get back to this.
